p:
Repeat elements were identified by combining de novo- and homology-based approaches. RepeatModeler
60 , LTR_Finder
61 , and RepeatScout
62 were used to construct a repeat library for de novo prediction. Based on the repeat sequence database, homology prediction was conducted using RepeatProteinMask and RepeatMasker
63 against the Repbase TE library
64 and the TE protein database. Noncoding RNA was annotated using tRNAscan-SE
65 (for tRNAs) or INFERNAL
66 (for miRNAs and snRNAs). The rRNAs were identified using BLASTN alignment and RNAammer
67 .
